channel.title: Alex Winter on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Alex Winter on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Adulthood’ Review: Alex Winter’s Dark Family Satire Is Not Exactly an Excellent Adventure
item.description: Josh Gad and Kaya Scodelario play siblings whose lives are upended after they discover human remains in their parents’ basement in this noir-edged TIFF premiere.

item.title: ‘Adulthood’ Review: Alex Winter’s Dark Family Satire Is Not Exactly an Excellent Adventure
item.description: Josh Gad and Kaya Scodelario play siblings whose lives are upended after they discover human remains in their parents’ basement in this noir-edged TIFF premiere.

item.title: Alex Winter’s Excellent Adventure in ‘Adulthood’
item.description: One half of Bill & Ted takes a break from documentaries to tackle a darkly funny noir he made like a ’90s indie: “It was something that I built from the ground up.”

item.title: Alex Winter’s Excellent Adventure in ‘Adulthood’
